titles.title: A bill to amend the Food and Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude certain military housing allowances from the eligibility requirements for food stamps.
A bill to amend the Food and Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude certain military housing allowances from the eligibility requirements for food stamps.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude certain military housing allowances from food stamp eligibility requirements.
